channel.title: Can any one help me on this DVD burning?
channel.description:
hey its me seto even if i ain't atcive here much there always something that is driving me back can any one tell me is there a way of locking a dvd when you burn it so when you put it in a dvd player you have to enter a password to see whats on it
if you guys can help that be great and hi to everyone

item.title: Can any one help me on this DVD burning?
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

I don’t think that’s possible…only because dvd players wouldn’t typically support any other method as far as i know. I suppose it would be possible to build in some type of password protection in the menus to load as the dvd starts, but I don’t know enough to know how easy it would be to get past it…I would guess not too difficult though

Read full topic
